For instance, we would like to have beluga whales at the aquarium, Van Goghs in the art museum and more than absolutely anything we would like to have a world class planetarium to blow our space-minds. We win, we get the space show. They win, they can have our far superior ballet company. On loan. " First, "sweet cultural action?" Project much?
